Description: Magical gem; intaglio; bloodstone; oval; engraved on obverse; boat; hawk with crown of Lower Egypt; hawk with crown of Upper Egypt; Harpocrates, holding flute, nude, crowned with disc, seated on lotus flower; inscribed.
Bibliographic references: Michel 2001 / Die Magischen Gemmen im Britischen Museum (134)
Bonner 1950 / Studies in magical amulets, chiefly Graeco-Egyptian
CBd / The Campbell Bonner Magical Gems Database Online (534) (http://classics.mfab.hu/talismans/cbd/534)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: G283 (Burns Gnostic Gem Number)
Other BM number: OA.9764 (Registration number and/or Big number reinstated in 2023)
